qa_pairs.question: How do I get help?
qa_pairs.answer:
You have multiple ways to get help:

**1. AI Assistant (Instant, 24/7)**
- Click the üí¨ chat icon (bottom right)
- Ask questions in plain English
- Get immediate answers with links

**2. Help Center (Self-Service, 24/7)**
- Click "Help" in main menu
- Search 100+ articles and guides
- Watch video tutorials
- Browse FAQs

**3. Live Chat (Mon-Fri 9 AM-6 PM EST)**
- Real-time help from support agents
- Screen sharing available
- 2-5 minute wait time

**4. Support Tickets (24/7 submission, 24-48hr response)**
- For complex issues
- Account-specific problems
- Payment/billing questions

**5. Community Forums (24/7)**
- Ask other users
- Share experiences
- Get peer advice

**Start with AI Assistant** - it solves 80% of questions instantly! If it can't help, it'll direct you to the right channel.

**Emergency? (Safety/Security/Fraud)**
Email: emergency@FanzUncut.com
Phone: 1-800-XXX-XXXX (24/7)

qa_pairs.question: How long does support take to respond?
qa_pairs.answer:
Response times vary by support channel and priority:

**By Channel:**

ü§ñ **AI Assistant:** Instant (24/7)

üí¨ **Live Chat:**
- Wait time: 2-5 minutes
- Available: Mon-Fri 9 AM - 6 PM EST

üé´ **Support Tickets:**
- üî¥ Urgent: <4 hours first response, 12-24 hours resolution
- üü† High: <24 hours first response, 2-3 days resolution  
- üü° Normal: <48 hours first response, 3-5 days resolution
- üü¢ Low: <72 hours first response, 5-7 days resolution

üë• **Community Forums:**
- Community: Often within minutes
- Staff: 24-48 hours (not guaranteed)

**What Affects Speed:**

‚úÖ Faster if:
- You provide detailed information
- Issue is urgent (safety, fraud)
- You've tried troubleshooting
- Professional, clear communication

‚ùå Slower during:
- Weekends and holidays
- High-volume periods
- Complex investigations
- Missing information from you

**Pro Tip:** Try AI Assistant first - 80% of questions get instant answers!

qa_pairs.question: How do I submit a support ticket?
qa_pairs.answer:
Here's how to submit an effective support ticket:

**Step 1: Access Ticket System**
- Click "Help" ‚Üí "Contact Support"
- Or visit: FanzUncut.com/support/ticket

**Step 2: Select Category**
Choose the best match:
- Account Issues (login, verification)
- Payment Issues (payouts, earnings)
- Technical Bugs (features not working)
- Content Issues (uploads, moderation)
- Safety & Abuse (harassment, violations)
- Billing Questions (subscriptions)
- Feature Requests (suggestions)
- Other

**Step 3: Provide Details**

‚úÖ **Clear subject:** "Video upload fails at 50%" (good) vs. "Help!" (bad)

‚úÖ **Detailed description:**
- What were you trying to do?
- What happened instead?
- When did it start?
- Have you tried troubleshooting?

‚úÖ **For bugs, include:**
- Steps to reproduce
- Device/browser information
- Screenshots of error messages
- What you expected to happen

‚úÖ **For account issues:**
- Username/email
- Relevant dates
- Transaction IDs (if applicable)

**Step 4: Attach Evidence**
- Screenshots (blur sensitive info)
- Error messages
- Videos showing the issue
- Relevant documents

**Step 5: Set Priority**
- üî¥ Urgent: Safety, fraud, locked account
- üü† High: Earnings, verification, critical bugs
- üü° Normal: General questions
- üü¢ Low: Feature requests, suggestions

**Step 6: Submit & Track**
- Get confirmation email with Ticket #
- Track: Help ‚Üí My Tickets
- Respond to agent questions promptly

**Example Good Ticket:**
```
Subject: Unable to upload videos - Error 500

I'm getting an error when trying to upload videos.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Go to Upload page
2. Select MP4 file (450MB, 1920x1080)
3. Fill in title and description
4. Click "Upload"
5. Progress bar reaches 50%, then error "Error 500: Upload failed"

This started today (Nov 16, 2025 around 2 PM EST).
I've successfully uploaded videos before.

Troubleshooting attempted:
- Cleared browser cache
- Tried different browser (Chrome and Safari)
- Tried smaller file (same error)
- Checked internet connection (stable)

Device: MacBook Pro M1
OS: macOS 14.2
Browser: Chrome 120.0

Attached: Screenshot of error message

Please help!
```

qa_pairs.question: Can I use live chat support?
qa_pairs.answer:
Yes! Live chat is available for real-time support:

**Availability:**
- **Days:** Monday - Friday
- **Hours:** 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM EST
- **Holidays:** Closed (check schedule)

**How to Access:**
1. Click "Help" ‚Üí "Live Chat"
2. Or click "Chat Now" button when available
3. Wait in queue (usually 2-5 minutes)
4. Chat with a real support agent

**Live Chat Features:**
- üñºÔ∏è Send screenshots during chat
- üñ•Ô∏è Screen sharing (with your permission)
- üìù Step-by-step guidance
- üîó Agent can send helpful links
- üíæ Transcript emailed after chat

**Best For:**
‚úÖ Quick questions needing immediate answers
‚úÖ Real-time troubleshooting
‚úÖ Guidance through complex tasks
‚úÖ Urgent (but not emergency) issues

**Not Ideal For:**
‚ùå Complex issues needing investigation
‚ùå Payment disputes (use tickets)
‚ùå After-hours support (use tickets or AI)
‚ùå Issues requiring escalation

**Outside Live Chat Hours?**
- Use AI Assistant (24/7 instant help)
- Submit a support ticket (24-48hr response)
- Check Help Center for self-service
- For emergencies: emergency@FanzUncut.com

**Pro Tip:** Have your username, relevant screenshots, and any error messages ready before starting chat for fastest resolution!

qa_pairs.question: How do I check my support ticket status?
qa_pairs.answer:
Track your support tickets easily:

**Access Your Tickets:**
1. Click "Help" ‚Üí "My Tickets"
2. Or visit: FanzUncut.com/support/tickets
3. You'll see all your tickets with current status

**Ticket Statuses:**

üÜï **New**
- Just submitted
- Not yet assigned to agent
- Typically 1-4 hours in this status

üëÄ **In Progress**
- Agent is actively working on it
- Investigation underway
- Check for updates in ticket

‚è∏Ô∏è **Waiting on You**
- Agent responded and needs info from you
- **Action required:** Reply with requested information
- Tickets auto-close after 7 days without response

‚úÖ **Resolved**
- Agent marked issue as solved
- Will auto-close in 48 hours
- Reopen if issue persists

üîí **Closed**
- Ticket completed
- Can reopen within 7 days if needed
- Rate support experience when prompted

**Ticket Actions:**

- üí¨ **Reply:** Add more information
- üìé **Attach Files:** Upload screenshots/documents
- ‚ö†Ô∏è **Mark Urgent:** Flag for priority (use sparingly!)
- ‚úÖ **Close:** If you solved it yourself
- üîÑ **Reopen:** Reopen within 7 days of closing
- ‚≠ê **Rate:** Give feedback on support quality

**Email Notifications:**
- You receive email when agent responds
- Can reply to ticket via email
- Check spam folder if not seeing updates

**Pro Tips:**
- Respond to "Waiting on You" tickets promptly
- Check ticket page directly (don't rely only on email)
- Provide requested info fully (avoids back-and-forth)
- Mark resolved when satisfied (helps everyone)

**Finding Ticket Number:**
- In confirmation email subject: "Ticket #12345"
- In My Tickets dashboard
- In any update emails from support

qa_pairs.question: What if I'm not satisfied with support response?
qa_pairs.answer:
If you're not satisfied with a support response, you have options:

**Step 1: Request Escalation**

1. Reply to your ticket with:
   - "I'd like to escalate this issue"
   - Explain why you're not satisfied
   - Be specific about what you need
   - Stay professional and factual

2. Your ticket will be reviewed by:
   - Senior support agent
   - Team lead
   - Specialist (for technical issues)

3. Response time: 24-48 hours

**Example Escalation Request:**
```
I appreciate the response, but I don't believe this solution
addresses my issue. Specifically:

1. [Explain what wasn't addressed]
2. [What you need instead]
3. [Why the proposed solution won't work]

Could a senior agent or specialist review this case?
Thank you.
```

**Step 2: Executive Review (If Still Unsatisfied)**

For serious unresolved issues:
1. Request "Executive Review" in your ticket
2. Summarize the full situation
3. Explain previous responses and why inadequate
4. State your desired resolution

**When Available:**
- After escalation didn't resolve issue
- For policy disputes
- For significant account problems

**Response:** 3-5 business days (final decision)

**Step 3: Provide Feedback**

After ticket closes:
- Complete satisfaction survey
- Rate support experience (1-5 stars)
- Explain what could be improved

**Your feedback helps us:**
- Improve agent training
- Identify process gaps
- Enhance support quality

**What NOT to Do:**

‚ùå **Don't spam multiple tickets** - Slows everyone down
‚ùå **Don't be rude to agents** - They want to help
‚ùå **Don't threaten** - Doesn't improve outcomes
‚ùå **Don't bypass support** - Go through proper channels

**Alternative Options:**

- **Community Forums:** Ask other users' opinions
- **Help Center:** Research alternative solutions
- **Live Chat:** Get second opinion from different agent

**Remember:** Support agents genuinely want to help. Clear, respectful communication about your needs leads to better outcomes than anger or threats.

qa_pairs.question: How do I report a bug?
qa_pairs.answer:
Report bugs to help us improve the platform:

**Step 1: Confirm It's a Bug**

‚úÖ **Likely a bug if:**
- Feature suddenly stopped working
- Error messages appear
- Unexpected behavior
- Crashes or freezes
- Content missing or corrupted

‚ùå **Not a bug if:**
- You don't understand how to use feature (check Help Center)
- Feature works differently than you expected
- You disagree with a policy or design choice

**Step 2: Gather Information**

Before reporting:
- **Try basic troubleshooting:**
  - Clear cache/cookies
  - Try different browser
  - Update app to latest version
  - Restart device
  - Check system status page

- **Collect details:**
  - What were you trying to do?
  - What happened instead?
  - When did it start?
  - How often does it happen?
  - Can you reproduce it?

- **System information:**
  - Device (iPhone 14, MacBook Pro, etc.)
  - OS version (iOS 17.2, macOS 14.2)
  - Browser (Chrome 120, Safari 17)
  - App version (if mobile app)

**Step 3: Report the Bug**

**Option A: Support Ticket (Recommended)**
1. Help ‚Üí Contact Support
2. Category: "Technical Bugs"
3. Detailed description with:
   - Steps to reproduce
   - Expected vs actual behavior
   - Screenshots/videos
   - System information

**Option B: Community Forums**
1. Community ‚Üí Technical Help
2. Search if already reported
3. Post with title: "[BUG] Brief description"
4. Include same details as ticket

**Option C: In-App Bug Reporter** (if available)
1. Shake device (mobile) or Cmd/Ctrl + Shift + B
2. Fill out quick form
3. Auto-includes system info
4. Screenshot automatically attached

**Example Bug Report:**
```
Title: [BUG] Video upload fails at 50%

Description:
When uploading videos over 400MB, upload consistently
fails at exactly 50% progress.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to Upload page
2. Select video file >400MB (MP4, 1080p)
3. Fill in title/description
4. Click Upload
5. Watch progress bar
6. At 50%, error appears: "Upload failed (Error 500)"

Expected: Video should upload completely
Actual: Fails at 50% every time

Frequency: 100% (tried 5 times)
Started: Nov 16, 2025 around 2 PM EST

System:
- Device: MacBook Pro M1 (2023)
- OS: macOS 14.2
- Browser: Chrome 120.0.6099.109
- Internet: 100 Mbps (stable, tested)

Troubleshooting Attempted:
- Cleared browser cache ‚úó
- Tried Safari ‚úó (same error)
- Tried smaller file (350MB) ‚úì (worked!)
- Different network ‚úó (same error)

Attachments:
- Screenshot of error
- Screen recording of upload attempt
- Console log (if requested)
```

**What Happens Next:**

1. **Bug Triaged** (1-2 days)
   - Confirmed as bug
   - Assigned priority
   - Added to development queue

2. **Investigation** (varies)
   - Engineers reproduce issue
   - Identify root cause
   - Develop fix

3. **Fix Deployed** (varies)
   - Critical bugs: Hours to days
   - High priority: Days to weeks
   - Low priority: Weeks to months

4. **You're Notified**
   - When fix is deployed
   - Release notes mention bug fix
   - Thank you for reporting!

**Priority Levels:**

üî¥ **Critical:** Platform down, data loss, security holes
‚Üí Fixed immediately (hours)

üü† **High:** Core features broken, affecting many users
‚Üí Fixed within days

üü° **Medium:** Minor features broken, workarounds exist
‚Üí Fixed within weeks

üü¢ **Low:** Cosmetic issues, rare edge cases
‚Üí Fixed when possible

**Pro Tips:**
- Report bugs early (helps more users)
- Detailed reports get fixed faster
- Check if already reported (Community Forums)
- Include workarounds if you find any

qa_pairs.question: What is the AI Assistant and how does it work?
qa_pairs.answer:
The AI Assistant is your 24/7 smart helper:

**What It Is:**
- AI-powered chatbot trained on our complete documentation
- Available instantly, anytime, anywhere
- Understands natural language (no keywords needed)
- Provides contextual, personalized help

**How to Access:**

1. **Chat Widget:** Click üí¨ icon (bottom right on any page)
2. **Help Menu:** Help ‚Üí Ask AI Assistant
3. **Keyboard:** Ctrl/Cmd + /
4. **Voice:** "Hey [Platform]" (mobile app)

**What It Can Do:**

‚úÖ **Answer Questions**
Ask anything in plain English:
- "How do I upload a video?"
- "Why is my payout delayed?"
- "How do I verify my account?"
- "What's the best way to price content?"

‚úÖ **Provide Step-by-Step Guidance**
- Walks you through processes
- Shows you where to click
- Offers to open relevant pages
- Adapts to your experience level

‚úÖ **Troubleshoot Issues**
- "My video won't upload" ‚Üí Suggests solutions
- "I can't log in" ‚Üí Checks common causes
- Provides specific fixes based on context

‚úÖ **Contextual Help**
- Knows what page you're on
- Offers proactive tips
- Suggests relevant features
- Highlights new updates

‚úÖ **Quick Actions**
- Open specific pages for you
- Fill in forms
- Apply settings
- Start tutorials

**Smart Features:**

üß† **Context-Aware**
- Remembers your conversation
- Knows your user type (creator/fan)
- Understands what you're trying to do
- Provides personalized suggestions

üí¨ **Natural Language**
- Talk like you would to a person
- No need for exact keywords
- Understands slang and abbreviations
- Multiple ways to ask same question

üìö **Comprehensive Knowledge**
- Trained on 100+ help articles
- Knows all platform features
- Updated with new features
- Access to FAQs and guides

üéØ **Proactive Assistance**
Offers help before you ask:
- "I noticed you're on the upload page. Need help?"
- "Looks like you've been here 30 seconds. Can I assist?"
- "This is a new feature! Want a quick tour?"

**Example Conversations:**

**Simple Question:**
```
You: How do I change my username?

AI: You can change your username in Settings!

1. Click your profile picture (top right)
2. Select "Settings"
3. Go to "Account" tab
4. Click "Edit" next to username
5. Enter new username
6. Click "Save"

Note: You can only change your username once every 30 days.

[Open Settings] [Learn More]
```

**Complex Issue:**
```
You: My video upload keeps failing

AI: I can help troubleshoot that! A few questions:

1. What file format is your video?
2. How large is the file?
3. What error message do you see?

You: MP4, about 800MB, says "Upload failed"

AI: Got it! Here are some solutions to try:

‚úì Clear your browser cache
‚úì Try a different browser
‚úì Compress video to under 500MB
‚úì Check your internet connection

Which would you like to try first?

[Clear Cache Guide] [Compression Tutorial] [Contact Support]
```

**When AI Can't Help:**

If the AI doesn't know the answer (rare):
- It suggests relevant Help Center articles
- Offers to create support ticket for you
- Connects you to live chat (if available)
- Escalates to human support automatically

**Privacy & Security:**
- Conversations are private
- Not shared with other users
- Used to improve AI (anonymized)
- Can opt out of data collection

**Pro Tips:**
- Ask follow-up questions - AI remembers context
- Be specific for better answers
- Try rephrasing if answer isn't quite right
- Use it first before submitting tickets (saves time!)

**Accuracy:**
- 95%+ accuracy on common questions
- Constantly improving from feedback
- Backed by human-written documentation
- Escalates when uncertain

qa_pairs.question: Is there a community forum?
qa_pairs.answer:
Yes! Join our active community forums:

**Access:** FanzUncut.com/community or Help ‚Üí Community

**Forum Categories:**

### üÜï New User Questions
- Getting started help
- Basic feature questions
- Friendly beginner environment
- No "dumb questions" here!

### üíº Creator Tips & Strategies
- Share success stories
- Growth strategies
- Monetization tips
- Networking with other creators
- Ask for advice

### üîß Technical Help
- Troubleshooting assistance
- Bug reports & workarounds
- Tips and tricks
- Community solutions

### üí° Feature Requests
- Suggest new features
- Vote on others' ideas
- Discuss improvements
- See what's coming

### üì¢ Platform Updates
- Official announcements
- New feature releases
- Scheduled maintenance
- Policy changes
- Product roadmap

**Community Benefits:**

üì¢ **Collective Knowledge**
- Learn from experienced users
- Real-world use cases
- Creative solutions
- Best practices

üöÄ **Fast Responses**
- Community often answers in minutes
- Multiple perspectives
- 24/7 availability
- No wait times

üí° **Creative Ideas**
- See how others solve problems
- Discover new strategies
- Get inspiration
- Learn advanced techniques

ü§ù **Networking**
- Connect with other creators
- Collaboration opportunities
- Make friends
- Build support network

üèÜ **Recognition**
- Earn badges for helping others
- Build reputation
- Become community expert
- Get noticed by platform team

**How to Use Forums:**

**Before Posting:**
1. ‚úì Search existing posts (might be answered)
2. ‚úì Read category guidelines
3. ‚úì Choose correct category

**Creating a Post:**
1. Click "New Post"
2. Select category
3. Write clear title: "How to schedule posts?" (good) vs. "Help!" (bad)
4. Provide context in description
5. Add tags for discoverability
6. Post!

**After Posting:**
- Monitor for replies
- Mark helpful answers as "Solution"
- Thank helpful users
- Update if you solve it yourself
- Close when resolved

**Forum Rules:**

‚úì **Be Respectful** - Treat others kindly
‚úì **Stay On Topic** - Post in appropriate category
‚úì **Search First** - Don't duplicate posts
‚úì **No Spam** - No ads or self-promotion
‚úì **Mark Solutions** - Help others find answers
‚úì **No Illegal Content** - Follow platform rules
‚úì **Be Patient** - Responses are voluntary

**Community Roles:**

üÜï **New Member** - Just joined
üë§ **Member** - Regular participant
‚≠ê **Contributor** - Helpful member (10+ solutions)
üèÜ **Expert** - Community leader (50+ solutions)
üõ°Ô∏è **Moderator** - Volunteer moderator
üëî **Staff** - Official platform team

**Staff Participation:**

- Official announcements posted here
- Staff occasionally answer questions
- Feature requests reviewed by product team
- Bug reports escalated to engineering
- Response time: 24-48 hours (not guaranteed)

**Notifications:**

Get notified when:
- Someone replies to your post
- Your answer is marked as solution
- You earn a badge
- Official announcements in categories you follow

**Pro Tips:**

- Search before posting (80% of questions answered)
- Tag your posts appropriately
- Upload screenshots for clarity
- Follow interesting topics
- Help others when you can (karma!)
- Vote up helpful posts

**Mobile App:**

- Full forum access on mobile
- Push notifications
- Easy posting with photos
- Follow conversations on the go
